Song.title: All Must Be Well
Song.copyright: Words by Mary Bowley-Peters alt by Matthew S. Smith, Music by Matthew S. Smith. Â© 2007 Detuned Radio Music (ASCAP)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: Through the [E]love of God our Savior, All will be [A]well Free and ch[E]angeless is His favor, All is [A]well Precious [F#m]is the blood that [B]healed us Perfect [C#m]is the grace that [A]sealed us Strong the [F#m]hand stretched forth to [B]shield us All must be [E]well
Verse 2: Though we [E]pass through tribulation, All will be [A]well Ours is [E]such a full salvation, All is [A]well Happy [F#m]still in God con[B]fiding Fruitful [C#m]if in Christ ab[A]iding Steadfast th[F#m]rough the Spirit's g[B]uiding All must be [E]well
Verse 3: We exp[E]ect a bright tomorrow; All will be [A]well Faith can [E]sing through days of sorrow, All is [A]well On our [F#m]Father's love re[B]lying Jesus [C#m]every need suppl[A]ying Yes in [F#m]living or in d[B]ying All must be [E]well
Tag: On our [F#m]Father's love re[B]lying Jesus [C#m]every need suppl[A]ying Yes in [F#m]living or in d[B]ying All must be [E]well
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 through the love of god our savior all will be well free and changeless is his favor all is well precious is the blood that healed us perfect is the grace that sealed us strong the hand stretched forth to shield us all must be well verse 2 though we pass through tribulation all will be well ours is such a full salvation all is well happy still in god confiding fruitful if in christ abiding steadfast through the spirits guiding all must be well verse 3 we expect a bright tomorrow all will be well faith can sing through days of sorrow all is well on our fathers love relying jesus every need supplying yes in living or in dying all must be well tag on our fathers love relying jesus every need supplying yes in living or in dying all must be well
